Title: When the Night
Writer: Cristina Comencini (novel), Cristina Comencini (screenplay), Doriana Leondeff (screenplay)
Actors: Claudia Pandolfi, Filippo Timi, Thomas Trabacchi, Denis Fasolo
Plot: Marina, a woman who has trouble with getting used to be a mother, takes a holiday in a mountain lodge with his baby boy. She lives a tragic incident and his landlord Manfred gets involved in it. From then on, a strange relation between Marina and Manfred begins.
